select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, m_enroll_date as memEnrollDate from member order by 1 DESC

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, m_enroll_date as memEnrollDate from member
